name: Fall of the Aristocats
description:
Fall of the Aristocats

is a first person adventure game that rotates around exploration, platforming, and stealth oriented combat mechanics. 

This DEMO was submitted as a Level Design project in our Game Design course, and was passionately developed by Hobo Shark Studio

Setup 

Our main protagonist “Kadiana” is a skilled assassin who belongs to an inferior class that is being neglected by the tyrant head of village - “Vagor”. 

Vagor closed the gate on the Tiri’s tribe for the last time and Kadiana is sent by the people to assassinate him and open the dividing gate for good. 

The Team 

(Ordered by studio name initials)

Hagar Ben Yair: Lead Game Design & Environment Art

Omri Tahar: Project Manager, Level Design, Programming

Bracha Kainov: Modeling, Animation

Ofir Harel: Lead Art, Level Design

Shay Maytav: Lead Animation, Programmer

Mark Guriev: Lead Programmer & Ultimate Git Handler
